page.description: EnableWebSite sets the status of a web site to enabled. Any deployments that are assigned to the web site and would have deployed except that the web site was disabled will be deployed.

argument.name: WebSiteName
argument.description: The name of the web site to be enabled.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
